snippet: Piotr Pasciak, who worked for a real estate company, kept the keys to the apartments he showed after leaving the job.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on the answer to the mystery of burglar Piotr Pasciak, who was arrested after being caught on camera entering an East Village apartment for a second time, apparently using a key he was not authorized to have; Pasciak has explained that he had kept keys he used when previously working in the area as a real estate agent showing apartments.
lead_paragraph: Piotr Pasciak, who worked for a real estate company, kept the keys to the apartments he showed after leaving the job.

headline.seo: Burglar Tells How He Got Into an East Village Apartment, Twice
headline.main: Burglar Tells How He Got Into an East Village Apartment, Twice
headline.print_headline: How He Did It, In the Words Of the Burglar
